description.p: Discover songs you are aching to know with an easy-to-use interface.
Mousai is a simple application that can identify song similar to Shazam. Just click the listen button, and then wait a few seconds. It will magically return the title and artist of that song!
Note: This uses the API of audd.io, so it is necessary to log in to their site to get more trials.
Why you will love Mousai?

ul.li: ğŸµ Identify the title and artist of the song within seconds.
ğŸ™ï¸ Use your microphone or audio from desktop.
ğŸ¸ Store the identified song including the album art in history.
ğŸ¼ Preview the identified song with the native player.
ğŸŒ Browse the song in the web with the link.

description.p: Entdecke Lieder, die du unbedingt kennenlernen mÃ¶chtest, mit einer einfach zu bedienenden BenutzeroberflÃ¤che.

Mousai ist eine einfache Anwendung, die Lieder Ã¤hnlich wie Shazam identifizieren kann. Klicke einfach auf die SchaltflÃ¤che â€ZuhÃ¶renâ€œ und warte ein paar Sekunden. Es wird auf magische Weise den Titel und den Interpreten dieses Liedes anzeigen!

description.p: Ezagutu ezagutu nahi dituzun abestiak, erabiltzeko erraza den interfaze batekin.

Mousai Shazamen antzeko abestiak identifika ditzakeen aplikazio erraz bat da. Entzuteko botoia sakatu eta segundo batzuk itxaron besterik ez duzu egin behar. Magikoki abesti horren izenburua eta artista itzuliko dizkizu!
Oharra: honek audidd.io APIa erabiltzen du, eta, beraz, beharrezkoa da saioa bere lekuan hastea proba gehiago lortzeko.
Zergatik gustatuko zaizu Mousai?

ul.li: ğŸµ Abestiaren izenburua eta artista identifikatzen ditu segundo batzuetan.
ğŸ™ï¸ Erabili zure mikrofonoa edo idazmahaiko audioa.
ğŸ¸ Abesti identifikatua gordetzen du, albumaren karatula barne, historian.
ğŸ¼ Jatorrizko erreproduzigailuarekin identifikatutako abestia aurreikusten du.
âŒ¨ï¸ Teklatu bidezko lasterketak, erraz erabiltzeko modukoak.

description.p: Dumiskubre ng mga kanta gamit ang napakadaling gamiting interface.
Ang Mousai ay isang simpleng aplikasyon na kayang maka-identify ng kanta tulad ng Shazam. Pinduting mo lang ang listen button, maghintay sandali. Ibibigay niya na ang pamagat at kumanta ng kanta!
Paalala: Gumagamit ito ng API ng audd.io, kaya kinakailangan na mag-log in sa kanilang site upang makatanggap ng mas maraming trials.
Bakit magugustuhan mo ang Mousai?

ul.li: ğŸµ Kaya niya i-identify and pamagat at kumanta ng kanta.
ğŸ™ï¸Gamitin ang mikropono o tunog mula sa iyong desktop.
ğŸ¸ I-store ang na-identify na kanta kasama ang album art.
ğŸ¼ I-preview ang kanta gamit ang built-in na player.
ğŸŒ I-browse ang kanta sa internet gamit ang link.
âŒ¨ï¸ Madaling gamiting mga keyboard shortcuts.

Mousai est une application simple qui peut identifier une chanson similaire Ã Shazam. Il suffit de cliquer sur le bouton d'Ã©coute, puis d'attendre quelques secondes. Comme par magie, le titre et l'artiste de la chanson seront affichÃ©sÂ !

description.p: Temukan lagu yang sangat ingin Anda ketahui dengan antarmuka yang mudah digunakan.

Mousai adalah aplikasi sederhana yang dapat mengenali lagu yang mirip dengan Shazam. Hanya dengan mengklik tombol dengarkan, dan tunggu beberapa detik. Mousai akan memberitahu judul dan artis lagu tersebut dengan ajaib!
Catatan: Ini menggunakan API milik audd.io, jadi Anda harus masuk (log in) pada situs mereka untuk mendapatkan lebih banyak percobaan.
Mengapa Anda akan mencintai Mousai?

ul.li: ğŸµ Kenali judul dan artis dari sebuah lagu dalam hitungan detik.
ğŸ™ï¸ Gunakan mikrofon atau suara anda dari desktop.
ğŸŒ Jelajahi lagu di web dengan tautannya.

description.p: Scopri le canzoni che non vedi l'ora di conoscere con un'interfaccia facile da usare.

description.p: Ontdek namen van nummers die je al lang wilde weten middels een eenvoudig te gebruiken toepassing.
Mousai is een eenvoudige toepassing waarmee je nummers kunt herkennen, net zoals Shazam. Klik op de luisterknop, wacht een paar seconden en het antwoord staat voor je klaar!
Let op: Mousai gebruikt de api van auddi.io. Log in op hun website om meer proeftijd te krijgen.
Waarom je Mousai wilt gebruiken?

ul.li: ğŸµ Vind de naam van een nummer en artiest in een mum van tijd.

ğŸ¼ Beluister het herkende nummer met de muziekspeler.
ğŸŒ Zoek het nummer op op internet middels de link.

description.p: This update contains a fix and translation updates:
This is a very minor release containing translations update:
This update contains new translations:
This is a minor release containing updated translations:
This is a fix release:
This release contains bug fixes and translations updates:

ul.li: Fixed missiong icon on XFCE (thanks to @apandada1)

description.p: This release contains UI and translation improvements:
This is a small update with miscellaneous improvements:

ul.li: Added a beep sound when trying to do something

description.p: This is a small update with miscellaneous improvements:
A semi-big release containing new features and major bug fixes:

ul.li: Added the ability to select preferred audio source (Either microphone or from desktop audio)
Added animation when playing a song
Check if there is an audio detected before sending request
Fixed not responding issue when the internet is slow
Fix multiple songs playing at once

description.p: This update contains translations and minor ui fixes:
This update contains translations and minor fixes:

ul.li: Better user experience with token dialog

description.p: This update contains minor fixes:

ul.li: Added option to not show token dialog at startup

description.p: This contains some fixes for the last update:

ul.li: Fixed a bug when clearing history while listening

description.p: A release containing exciting new features and fixes!

ul.li: New built-in player for the identified music
Much improved UI, especially with GTK4
It now saves the window size

description.p: Not a big release, but it has some notable changes:

ul.li: Added shortcuts for clearing history and resetting token

description.p: Minor improvements:

ul.li: Window is no longer destroyed on clear history

description.p: New features and performance improvements:

ul.li: Added a play button to preview songs
Song history would not output redundant songs now

description.p: This update brings few bug fixes:

ul.li: Fixed a bug when there are two similar named songs
Fixed an error when the song was not recognized
Added an error when the token has run out

description.p: Initial release.
